text: Miriam Gonzàlez Duràntez is the wife of former Deputy Prime Minister Nick Clegg. She is also known as Lady Clegg. She is a Spanish lawyer, specialized in business land trade law. She's considered an expert in European Union trade law. She was born in Spain, on 31 May 1967. They have three sons: Antonio Alberto and Miguel. Gonzalez-Duranzez also heads the initiative "Inspiring Girls", who wants fight gender stereotypes. Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish lawyers
title: Miriam González Durántez
